dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2467 IH: Supporting Middle America’s Airports Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Meuser (for himself and Mr. Trone) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to modify the eligibility requirements for the essential air service program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supporting Middle America’s Airports Act.
Section 41731 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: subparagraph (B) by inserting and at the end; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (c) by striking Subparagraphs (B), (C), and (D) of subsection (a)(1) and inserting Subparagraphs (B) and (C) of subsection (a)(1) and subsection (g); and
by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: Beginning on the day that is 3 years after the date of enactment of this subsection, the Secretary may only provide compensation to an air carrier under this subchapter for the provision of essential air service to a place if, at any time before such day, the place received essential air service under this subchapter.
